trans-unit.source: Represents a security key that is generated using the RSA algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma chave de segurança que é gerada usando o algoritmo RSA.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityKey"></xref> class using the specified RSA algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityKey"> </xref> classe usando o algoritmo RSA especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref> that represents an RSA algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"> </xref> que representa um algoritmo RSA.

trans-unit.source: rsa is .
trans-unit.target: rsais .

trans-unit.source: Decrypts the specified encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: Descriptografa a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm that was used to encrypt the key.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo de criptografia que foi usado para criptografar a chave.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaV15KeyWrap"></xref> and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaOaepKeyWrap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Os algoritmos com suporte são <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaV15KeyWrap"> </xref> e <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaOaepKeyWrap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Byte>que contém a chave criptografada.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the decrypted key.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Byte>que contém a chave descriptografada.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: algorithm is not supported.
trans-unit.target: algorithmNão há suporte.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaV15KeyWrap"></xref> and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaOaepKeyWrap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Os algoritmos com suporte são <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaV15KeyWrap"> </xref> e <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaOaepKeyWrap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: keyData is .
trans-unit.target: keyDatais .

trans-unit.source: Encrypts the specified key using the specified algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Criptografa a chave especificada usando o algoritmo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm to encrypt the key with.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo de criptografia para criptografar a chave com.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the key.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Byte>que contém a chave.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Byte>que contém a chave criptografada.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: algorithm is not supported.
trans-unit.target: algorithmNão há suporte.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaV15KeyWrap"></xref> and <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaOaepKeyWrap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Os algoritmos com suporte são <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaV15KeyWrap"> </xref> e <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaOaepKeyWrap"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: keyData is .
trans-unit.target: keyDatais .

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified asymmetric cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o algoritmo de criptografia assimétrico especificado.

trans-unit.source: The asymmetric algorithm to create.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo assimétrico para criar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when a private key is required to create the algorithm; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Quando uma chave privada é necessária para criar o algoritmo; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"></xref> that represents the specified asymmetric cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"> </xref> que representa o algoritmo de criptografia assimétrico especificado.

trans-unit.source: requiresPrivateKey is and a private key is not available.
trans-unit.target: requiresPrivateKey é e uma chave privada não está disponível.

trans-unit.source: Gets a cryptographic algorithm that generates a hash for a digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um algoritmo de criptografia que gera um hash de uma assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo de hash.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithm is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo com suporte é <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm"></xref> that generates hashes for digital signatures.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm"> </xref> que gera hashes para assinaturas digitais.

trans-unit.source: algorithm is not supported.
trans-unit.target: algorithm Não há suporte.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithm is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo com suporte é <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o algoritmo de formatador para a assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: The de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature to get an instance of.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo de formatador para a assinatura digital obter uma instância do.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithm is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo com suporte é <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter"></xref> that represents the de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter"> </xref> que representa o algoritmo de formatador para a assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: algorithm is not supported.
trans-unit.target: algorithm Não há suporte.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithm is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo com suporte é <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o algoritmo de formatador para a assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: The formatter algorithm for the digital signature to get an instance of.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo de formatador para a assinatura digital obter uma instância do.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithm is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo com suporte é <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter"></xref> that represents the formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter"> </xref> que representa o algoritmo de formatador para a assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: algorithm is not supported.
trans-unit.target: algorithm Não há suporte.

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithm is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo com suporte é <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the private key is available.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a chave privada está disponível.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the private key is available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Quando a chave privada está disponível. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm uses asymmetric keys.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o algoritmo especificado usa chaves assimétricas.

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo de criptografia.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the specified algorithm uses asymmetric keys; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Quando o algoritmo especificado usa chaves assimétricas; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm is supported by this class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se esta classe oferece suporte para o algoritmo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo de criptografia.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the specified algorithm is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaV15KeyWrap"></xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaOaepKeyWrap"></xref>, or <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Quando o algoritmo especificado é <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaV15KeyWrap"> </xref>, <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaOaepKeyWrap"> </xref>, ou <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm uses symmetric keys.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o algoritmo especificado usa chaves simétricas.

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo de criptografia.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the specified algorithm uses symmetric keys; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Quando o algoritmo especificado usa chaves simétricas; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size, in bits, of the key.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho, em bits, da chave.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> supports key lengths from 384 bits to 16384 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>oferece suporte a comprimentos de chave de 384 bits para 16384 bits em incrementos de 8 bits, se você tiver o Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider instalado.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: It supports key lengths from 384 bits to 512 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider installed.
trans-unit.target: Ele dá suporte comprimentos de chave de 384 bits de 512 bits em incrementos de 8 bits se você tiver o Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider instalado.

trans-unit.source: The size, in bits, of the key.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho, em bits, da chave.
